Trade/Device Name(s): EG V1 Pro Self Monitoring Blood Glucose Test System
EG V1 (BL) Self Monitoring Blood Glucose Test System
Specimen Type(s): Fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip
Fresh capillary whole blood from palm
Fresh capillary whole blood from forearm
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for EG V1 Pro and EG V1 (BL) Self Monitoring Blood Glucose Test Systems for quantitative measurement of glucose using electrochemical biosensor technology
Indications for Use Summary: EG V1 Pro: For quantitative measurement of glucose in venous or capillary whole blood (fingertip), intended for multiple-patient professional healthcare use, not for neonates or diagnosis/screening of diabetes; EG V1 (BL): For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood (fingertip, palm, forearm), intended for single-patient home use, not to be shared or used on neonates, nor for diagnosis/screening of diabetes
